titles.title: Fair Pay Anti-Retaliation Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to protect employees who seek equal wages under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/7/2000--Introduced. Fair Pay Anti-Retaliation Act - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to revise prohibitions against sex discrimination in the payment of wages (also known as the Equal Pay Act) to prohibit retaliation by discrimination, discharge, or other adverse action against any individual active in enforcing such prohibitions.
